de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui

Class GuiNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui.GuiElement
      • de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui.GuiNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGuiElement, IGuiNode, IHasZValue, IPaintable, ISelectable, IElement, INode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiPlace, GuiTransition

    public abstract class GuiNode
extends GuiElement
implements IGuiNode
    Superclass GuiNode implements the common members for all nodes.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

      private static boolean debug
      Show debug messages?
      protected int fontSize
      The font size for the label

      x value for the height of the node (including the label)

      x value for the highest point of the node (including the label)
      protected int totalWidth
      x value for the width of the node (including the label)
      protected boolean unreachable
      This nodes "unreachable" status: True = unreachable; False = can be reached from the start place and can reach the end place

    • Method Detail

      • getShapeSize

        public static int getShapeSize()
        Returns the size of all shapes (static attribute).

        Note: Used for placing new nodes inside of the visible area (left and top border > 0).
        Returns:
        The current shape size

      • getPosition

        public java.awt.Point getPosition()
        Description copied from interface: INode
        Returns the position (center) of this node.

        Note that for the GUI "center" refers to the shape of this node itself (place, transition). It does not include the label.
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface INode
        Returns:
        The position

      • getTotalLeftX

        public int getTotalLeftX()
        Description copied from interface: IGuiNode
        Returns the x value for the left boundary of the surrounding area.
